title: LLM - one0one (1e)
text:
Welcome
This is the website for the 1st edition of “LLM one0one”. This book will teach you how to do deal with LLM.
In this book, you will find a practicum of skills for Large Language Model as well as Small Language Model.
This website is and will always be free, licensed under the CC BY-NC-ND 3.0 License. If you’d like a physical copy of the book, you can order it on [Amazon](https://www.amazon.in/ If you appreciate reading the book for free and would like to give back, please make a donation to Kākāpō Recovery: the kākāpō (which appears on the cover of R4DS) is a critically endangered parrot native to New Zealand; there are only 244 left.
If you speak another language, you might be interested in the freely available translations of the 1st edition:

Spanish
Italian
Turkish
Portuguese

Please note that R4DS uses a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this book, you agree to abide by its terms.
